description: Provides metadata information about a custom vocabulary.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot that contains the custom vocabulary.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The bot version of the bot to return metadata for.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The locale to return the custom vocabulary information for. The locale must be en_GB.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot that contains the custom vocabulary.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that contains the custom vocabulary to describe.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The locale that contains the custom vocabulary to describe.

nested_items.name: customVocabularyStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the custom vocabulary. If the status is Ready the custom vocabulary is ready to use.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the custom vocabulary was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the custom vocabulary was last updated.
